meanings.sent1: The cat lived happily in the cozy home.
meanings.sent2: I have lived in this town for many years.
meanings.sent3: The tree lived peacefully in the forest, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Her memories lived vividly in her mind, like a movie playing on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The old book lived on the dusty shelf, waiting to be read again.

meanings.sent1: They lived in a small house by the river.
meanings.sent2: We have lived in this neighborhood for a long time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel lived in the hollow of the tree, storing nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: His words lived in the hearts of the people, echoing through the village.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter lived in the walls of the old building, a reminder of happier times.

meanings.definition: To experience life in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She lived through many challenges and emerged stronger.
meanings.sent2: They have lived through tough times together.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous spirit lived in him, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music lived in every note he played, touching the hearts of listeners.
meanings.sent5: The love they shared lived in every moment they spent together, creating cherished memories.
